results.title: Celebrities who spoke about their anxiety and depression
results.content: country where any physiological disorder mental illness looked down upon, it takes lot to open up about it, that too on public platform. but these heroes stepped just for the sake of normalising issues so people can take heed understand first place. youâ€™ll be surprised know following names. ready? shahrukh khan 2008, suffered major injury his right shoulder, ignorance made pain worse, he finally had undergo minimally invasive surgery 2010. led superstar relax at home stay away from work caused anxiety. post surgery, revealed all said shoulder suffering depression was out it. also, felt happy boosted with energy. charmer as always, you give us hope srk. <3 manisha koirala beautiful has been through some rough patches past like marital discord subsequent battle cancer. this, turn, left actor wallowing depths depression. she sought clinical help, spoke widely starred movie called â€œdear mayaâ€ last year briefly touched topic awesome, isnâ€™t she? deepika padukone idolised by many india across globe her beauty, elegance, charisma. when an apparent heartbreak go didnâ€™t keep under wraps admitted sheâ€™d frequently break found hard concentrate. eventually, way puddle once received help care. realise importance health awareness established â€˜live love laughâ€™ cause. go, girl! anushka sharma known politically statements witty replies. tries hide paparazzi never holds back wants voice opinions. one time put quote twitter related depression/anxiety twitterati well. how responded: â€œi have i’m treating my medication why am saying this? because itâ€™s completely normal thing. it’s biological problem. family, there cases more should talk openly nothing shameful something hide. if constant stomach pain, wouldnâ€™t doctor? simple. want make mission, shame educate this.â€ youâ€™re class act, anushka! varun dhawan star moment. we commitment acting off late impressed every possible. fun-loving banter, youâ€™d not imagine him ever faced otherwise. while shooting movie, badlapur being partially depressed. â€œ..i clinically declared depressed heading there. very sad certain degree. don’t use term ‘depression’ loosely serious illness. definitely affected health. prescribed did see doctor well.â€ thank you, dhawan. hope! weâ€™ve assured biggies, now letâ€™s treat beat instead brushing rug.

walk shame munni badnaam hui dabbang) cersei prey own vicious plan perform leave prison. darling none other than iron throne, â€œmunni hui, liyeâ€ situation way well. hardhome night resurrects wildlings come party bhootnath bhootnath) gives us chills just icy demeanour whatâ€™s more terrifying are cold powers can make dead back life zombies. #creepy. srk pose resurrected, itâ€™s like heâ€™s saying â€œcome bhootnath, relax man.â€ last thing rebirth aala re simmba) fangirls lost their minds stabbed once, twice five times. except magical world got, dramatic back(we sense vibe here) suit â€œaala simmba aalaâ€. slow-mo effects leaves mark branâ€™s hand main yaha hoon time curious about bumped into him army creepy af. let alone staring soul holding hand. â€œjaanam dekh lo mitt gayi dooriyan, yaha.â€ #sorrynotsorry sets citadel sadda haq rockstar) causing carnage, sheâ€™s smiling much, know set fire. literally. didnâ€™t treat queen burned ground â€œsadda ethe rakhâ€ playing background. sab begaana inhein lagaana arya walder frey aisi dhaakad dangal) family betrayed won themselves top position aryaâ€™s infamous list. dhaakad(tough) gets, â€œtane chaaro khaane chitt kar degi, purze fit degi… hai!â€ revengeful scene oh perfectly! results.title: Spotlight: Rajkummar Rao
results.content: rajkummar rao chameleon. he can be an introvert as govind kai po che, force to reckon with shahid, annoying example of patriarchy vijay queen, loving family man citylights, honest election officer newton, shy pritam doubled flamboyant bareilly ki barfi lovable feminist tailor stree. there ainâ€™t role perfectionist canâ€™t pull off. was merely school-boy eighth grade when his heart kindled audacious love for cinema. coming from middle-class family, didnâ€™t have it easy but the call dreams louder than shortcomings. strong support larger life passion, made best what had, today one most celebrated artists bollywood flaunts. says cannot quite trace root probably lies somewhere within four walls gurgaon residence where fondest memories childhood revolve around movie marathons that would take place on weekends, entire watched two-three films sitting. all us loved films, so every saturday, we get vcr watch two at night. slowly, started falling filmi world. mid-2000s rajkumar headed college acting school delhi by travelling bus haryana 7.30am morning. pass time? observing passengers experimenting various avatars. instance, once played deaf dumb notice how crowd reacted presence. learned. <<<<<<< .merge_file_hhm9rf years, my teachers paid fees, says. ever discouraged me pursuing dream. â€œfor fees,â€ â€œbut dream.â€ >>>>>>> .merge_file_kolyx1 easy, struggled drama next everyone saw spark him, do more, achieve greater heights transform into version himself. knew strengths though always stayed true success depended more work appearance. done learning immediately shifted mumbai pursue lifelong almost years until got locked sex aur dhokha 2010. everything lsd. anurag (kashyap) lsd liked it, called gangs wasseypur. then (casting director) mukesh chabbra mentioned name hansal mehta shahid. speaking arrived bollywood, believes itâ€™s hard work. people will invest you only if they see some kind return thatâ€™s dark truth. trapped omerta are toughest has done. being stickler accuracy method acting, barely ate drank water 15-20 days trapped. blackouts – naturally, body reacting trust me, think way wanted portray screen. apart artist perfectionist, legend actor many other talents weâ€™re unaware of. very few know am trained dancer. audience applause part earliest performer go-getter comes choosing roles, likes go gut. listen your gut follow because here marathon, not sprint. want keep running. isnâ€™t outsider anymore after industry, head high feet ground. iâ€™m still curious kid who looks surreal planet distance. â€œeverything shahid.â€ â€œpeople truth.â€ â€œi screen.â€ â€œvery memoriesâ€ â€œyou running.â€ â€œiâ€™m distance.â€ star! brilliant mental hai kya, black comedy rumoured release soon, imli film basu, china dinesh vijan.

results.title: Monsoons bring out the Bollywood in everyone!
results.content: the peculiar smell of first rains monsoon often makes me reminisce about era raj kapoor & nargis romancing under their umbrella while singing pyaar hua ikraar hua. breathe aura my favourite season, hear dad humming rajesh khannaâ€™s bheegi raaton mein, somehow sounding so much like kishore kumar. which wonder if couldâ€™ve made it as playback singer. realise married perfect match when catch mom crooning rim jhim gire saawan reading newspaper. overwhelming truth they bring out bollywood everyone! thereâ€™s something melodic ceremonious them that you want to sing dance. every romantic movie has cute rain song scene. remember chak dhoom from dil toh pagal hai? smile myself know all steps song! well, surprises there. best part are surprise midweek holidays long weekend. exactly prepare special marathon list. time around, hereâ€™s what includes.. taal tale forbidden love tears apart turns into musical saga thatâ€™s breathtaking beautiful. youâ€™ll be its tunes after ends! hai quadrangle gets rather emotional because everyone believes fairy tales. one typical yrf watch with plastered your face.. an occasional teary-eyed moment. perfect. mr. india possibly indiaâ€™s ever science fiction was massive blockbuster! rollercoaster ride action, drama, romance, everything keep raving for more. takes back childhood, why! rhtdm apparently, â€œall fair loveâ€ taken way too liberty quote. adorable scenes catchy songs make quintessential rainy day cinematic experience. hum tum famous war sexes interesting turn two haters serendipitously meet over different phases life. animated versions both characters will giggling movie! jab we met fits occasion, itâ€™s charming enough lighten mood inner child. romance not focus here, more, self-love prepping switch tv on, cosied up couch, occasionally mimicking dialogues dance-steps. couldnâ€™t happier. best. day. ever. whatâ€™s list like?

results.title: Things That Happen When You Meet A Celebrity
results.content: serendipity funny thing, theyâ€™re unexpected moments that bring out the most side of person. but when it comes to serendipitous meets with celebrity, alter ego can range from borderline fanatic creepy stalker idiotic starer. itâ€™s true. these reel-life biggies have jaw-dropping effects on real-life people. they come face-to-face an audience, cause overwhelming surge emotion cannot be fathomed. just like us after all, right? we all know that. think weâ€™d super chill if celebrity happened pop up next aeroplane theatre. assume compliment them, take selfie perhaps, crack witty joke may be, leave them beaming, exit good impression. well, thanks our starstruck nerves, never case. ever. speak experience. living mumbai has its perks, iâ€™ve found myself exactly where b-town were few lucky times. one time didnâ€™t get too spotting shahrukh salman khan, saw aamir. he was standing posh bandra locality, close his bentley 0007 before could process actually waved at me. part me thought dreaming, another wanted go him picture, mostly stood there rooted, surprised react. until today about how easily had word him, asked project drove away. silly worst was, nobody believed because â€œpictures happenâ€ rule live by 21st century. promised then, spot celeb, my first instinct got clicking photograph. so did. bumped into john abraham, week final exams overwhelmed (it right movie dostana released, you what mean?) told looked better priyanka chopra than bipasha basu. composed, been embarrassed comment till date. haunts bipasha, did look give even mindless babble john, thinking least mute aamir incident. kept it. during college around neighbourhood spread use electricity. those homes turned aditya roy kapoorâ€™s rented flat. oh, odds? chivalrous host who politely listened. shy suave presence ask for picture naive teenage girl delighted held elevator door thatâ€™s all. remains favourite gave confidence, course, getting famous ones. having casual conversation big deal anymore. grown up. popular acquaintance ayushmann khurrana birthday, promoting vicky donor same building partying. great facebook. then interviewed alia bhatt magazine interning felt talking someone own age. kinda was. photo her too. jacqueline. let tell you, she hottest legs ever seen. yet celebs, happen hard reach, started lose their charm eyes. either seeing often grew eventually over maddening hysteria celebs triggered. times spotted stars like, karishma kapoor fashion store, kalki koechlin peace rally, farhan akhtar shraddha concert, sushmita sen week, anupam kher outside acting institute ratna pathak theatre, bother picture. smiled be. donâ€™t wrong. iâ€™m crazy bollywood buff still remain fan pristine art. separate really are. agree easier said done work inspired many levels canâ€™t help express love them. truth is, p.s: none applies ranbir kapoor. heâ€™s bae.

results.title: My Life Is A Movie: How Bollywood Defines Most Indians
results.content: was born to regular indian family who had an irregular (or quite typical) love for all things bollywood. my mom grew up having sadhna-cut, while dad flaunted rajesh khanna kinda crown as per the vintage, brown-coloured pictures iâ€™ve seen of two. guess they found perfect match! itâ€™s obvious watched gazillion bollywood movies through childhood, though disney nickelodeon wouldâ€™ve been finer option, parents chose otherwise. very remember how we used watch first day show most releases. matlab guy at box office knew by name, geddit? sleep three-hour-circus, distinctly watching hera pheri 2000. merely five, but laughed heart out can call that real experience. teen takle one two rofl. over years have observed encountered impact on our lives. life solely be example this. then started noticing cinema has created universe its own, aspirational bubble every craves part of. letâ€™s just say some are inspired from events, real-life events movies. kabhi mere dil mein khayal aata hai ki.. india basically walks, talks gawks like me! if â€œdon ko pakadna mushkil hi nahi..â€ you donâ€™t complete sentence with â€œnamumkin hai!â€ even friends?! see, references litmus test finding soulmates. it fashion hairstyles, culture defined what actors wear do. when dostana came 2008, swear god, half women same haircut! friends whoâ€™ve told me theyâ€™ve gone salon said, â€œpriyanka-wala haircut chahiye.â€ (including me). well, tradition were of, so deny pop-culture? least better than sadhna-cut two, thanks thanks, mom. apart this, literally use dialogues day-to-day conversations. these get going gloomy person gets movie dialogue from, sign true me. romantic heroines dancing chiffon sarees, scenic mountain. us dreamily hoped doing day. jab met released, lured visit manali, bhatinda drab ratlam ki galiyan! first-hand geet didnâ€™t end there, yeh jawaani deewaniâ€™s travel diaries epic, place visited soon became tourist attraction. ranbirâ€™s choice career film inspiring most. bollywoodâ€™s weddings? dream anyone ever had, bring via their pre-wedding shoot sangeet function. hum saath hain major reasons why families prepare musical newlyweds. recent times, getting made entire wedding become fad too. all, like, â€œbano re bano chali sasural ko, ankhiyon paani (and debt) de gayi..â€ :p serious note, does heavy responsibility portray important lessons stories, inspire revolutionary change not pop-culture. weâ€™re star-struck always expect happy ending. reality, fun games night away, instigating violence, jingoism, sexism racism reflect society how! luckily landscape evolving now stories perspective. therefore, trust you, given colourful life, chase dreams, hope future, own heroes kept entertained. thank bollywood.. tu cheez badi mast mast!

results.title: Spotlight: Taapsee Pannu
results.content: the loud-heart, feisty ever-empowered taapsee pannu has won our hearts with her fierce roles fearless persona. she an unabashed humour desi vibe that makes us want to watch every movie sheâ€™s ever done, be it hindi, tamil telugu movie! results.title: From Romantic Dramas to Fresh New Genres, How Bollywood has evolved
results.content: there was time, not long ago, when bollywood synonymous to romantic movies where protagonists danced around trees ran towards each other slow-mo, while the wind blew their hair dramatically. you know drill. weâ€™re saying didnâ€™t have any genre, we sure did. but somehow base theme of action, comedy, thriller, even sci-fi(mr.india, robot, krish) film always mushy love story. cut today, thereâ€™s classy raazi, andhadhun, stree, badhaai ho; massy sanju, padmaavat, simmba; everything between. romance may be completely out window just yet, it has surely gone from being supporting sidekick, ending happy one. progress! realism concept that taken far more seriously new age cinema than ever before. real-life stories historical events are transferred beautifully onto silver screen. also experimenting with different genres, trying test waters, audience definitely adapting growing it. for instance, past year, saw two films horror genre pari stree which starred big-time artists like anushka sharma former rajkumar rao latter. both them did well, no, actors get typecast either.

results.content: call her queen, datto, simran manikarnika, the feisty daring kangana ranaut has created own glorious niche bollywood. onscreen she enkindles pure magic offscreen roars like lioness that sets everyone straight with no-filter attitude. apart from being wooed by exquisite fashion sense, media often talking about controversial statements are more than not absolutely on point. most of us already have an idea who as person boss lady! results.title: Has Bollywood grown out of 'happy endings'?
results.content: â€œkehte hai ki filmon tarah hamari zindagi mein bhi end tak sab theek hi ho jaata hai. happys endings. aur agar na toh woh â€˜the endâ€™ nahi. picture abhi baaki mere dost.â€ -shahrukh khan from om shaanti seems like metaphor for happy living isnâ€™t valid anymore because the landscape of bollywood has evolved past few years so its audience. well, at least latter starting to. weâ€™re talking about going beyond idea â€œhappily ever afterâ€. movie plots arenâ€™t same anymore, theyâ€™re to familiarize audience with open-endings some cases miserable note looming curiosity. instance movies piku, finding fanny lunchbox, donâ€™t on perfect notes they do give you promise better future but not exactly fairytale ending. itâ€™s exciting watch cinema where romance subtle predictable. masaan yet another great example it sure makes viewers feel know what watching leaves them shock wonder. speaking which highway rockstar tread far category. both advance unexpected directions finally leave us tears million questions. best part is, these esoteric highly vague nature, fact, are almost always relatable. just make bit uncomfortable owing unorthodox perspective. producers known commercial also into now. instance, ek main ekk tu by dharma productions ended friendly instead romantic one. did ae dil mushkil. portraying real-life scenarios people get friend-zoned and/or rejected, their first love necessarily happily after. there various other filmmakers who took route. unexplained endings fad now! dhadakne zoya akhtar, kahaani sujoy ghosh, once upon time mumbai milan luthria dev anurag kashyap all left intrigued how. minus conventional ending that organically provide food thought. when avoid choose an abstract alternative want our imagination; without many definitions, films speak volumes. initially, we incomplete weâ€™ve been feeding fairy-tale cinema, slowly steadily sailed quite far. letâ€™s say, more than glad be generation experienced evolution indian cinema. have loved ddlj as much enjoyed udta punjab badlapur. open new ideas eccentric plots. progressive canâ€™t wait experience everything industry store us. stream afters (and never afters) here.

results.title: Badrinath ki Dulhania
results.content: badrinath bansal from jhansi vaidehi trivedi kota belong to small towns but have diametrically opposite opinions on everything. leads clash of ideologies, despite both them recognizing the goodness each other. making badri his dulhania ki varun dhawan alia bhatt when all heart & fiery come together, you get vaidehi. watch unplugged, talking about dulhania’s quirks, similarities differences their real selves. tamma 'method acting' if taking your role too seriously still fun with it was thing, leading pack! how followed ‘method acting’ for keeping up badri’s not so sober habits!

results.title: Being A Badass Villain: Boon or Curse in Bollywood?
results.content: villain (n): character whose evil actions motives are important to the plot. thereâ€™s certain charm that villains garnish on silver screen. so much their badass mannerisms might just mesmerize you more than protagonistsâ€™ heroism. youâ€™d agree if youâ€™ve been gaga over gabbar from sholay mogambo mr.india; recently baa ram leela bhallaladeva baahubali. doubt these nasty beings give us creeps, but they another level of awesome! it thought, iconic villain-dialogues famous heroic ones. when ferocious interrogates his men with â€œkitne aadmi the?â€ we bet world responds â€œsardaar, do the.â€ unison rest dialogues pretty history. also â€œmogambo khush hua!â€, â€œprem naam hai mera, prem chopra!â€ unforgettable â€œk..k..k..k.. kiran?â€. (wait, did read all actual villain-voice? haha!) well, hats off stellar actors for acing antagonistic roles such genius. must be difficult go deep into skin any comes negative one, surely take toll them. fact, many have confessed how maddening can play bad guy. because sometimes intense affects them psychologically itâ€™s hard jump out return normalcy. champion aim being hated by audience, intimidate wish theyâ€™d die sooner hero save day once again. aftermath role impacts actor longer weâ€™d imagine. driving edge self-hate trauma. remember heath ledger who played joker dark knight? know he took seriously ultimately went control. jim sarbh unforgiving terrorist khalil neerja would slightly not relate setbacks villain. an intimidating hijacker film kept distance people sets beyond maintain character. interview ht brunch, said, â€œi scene, walk quietly, talk anyone till next scene. was tiring iâ€™m really nice guy!â€. ranveer singh alauddin khilji controversial period padmaavat (earlier padmavati) had fair share emotional experiences too. apart makeover change workout regimes, nuts about transforming himself â€œcruel rulerâ€. told cafe journey longest heâ€™s ever endured far career. â€œit required lot energy me. letâ€™s put way: affected me,â€ admitted. â€œcleanse exorcise khiljiâ€ system, eventually visited psychiatrist. getting haircut vacationing london, uk helped him get back normal. (sigh!) own perks cons, most highlight passion hustle our embrace through big guys bollywood, may your characters see light day. eventually, destroyed heroes. (haha) tell favourite is, along dialogue! ours has jaykant shikre singham goes, â€œaali re aali, aata tujhi baari aali.â€ ;)

results.title: Top 3 Character artists in Bollywood
results.content: character artists like pran, anupam kher paresh rawal laid the foundation for recent stars irfan khan, nawazuddin siddiqui pankaj tripathi, proving that most movies would be nothing without their strong brilliant performances add an edge to various storylines. while movie may never remembered solely these gems, we know talent passion makes characters live on forever. they can play friendly, philosophical, romantic, hilarious, sensitive downright despicable roles, but one common element outstanding performers bring our screens versatility. call them subordinates, sidekicks supporting actors, are incomplete dynamic acts weâ€™re here give journey big shoutout have made indian cinema what it today. pran kewal sikand, known by mononym chanced upon acting career 1940. after brief struggle, he scored his bollywood debut ziddi. gained popularity lean mean roles ram aur shyam, milan, heer ranjha, kashmir ki kali more. evil so believable people stopped naming kids pran. was only beginning of reign, with upkar 1967 broke villain typecast playing positive emotional role set him free. zanjeer, don, majboor, naseeb, amar akbar anthony karz few examples followed. played grey somehow were heroic own way. gambler who turns into mechanic family man helps criminals save wife possessive caretaker conceals grave secret chameleon! worked 600+ skyrocketing outlasted careers many superstars dilip kumar, dev anand, amitabh bachchan, rishi kapoor, etc. reportedly paid more than protagonists early 1970s due seniority industry. during casting bobby, raj kapoor couldn’t afford then agreed do film signing amount re 1. once stated, if reincarnation exists, heâ€™d born as all over again. shimla 1955 inclined towards at young age. gold medal theatre department college, sent national school drama. thereafter future seemed bright fledgeling actor struggled drama teacher lucknow mumbai until saaransh via mahesh bhatt. old even though 28 year time truly recognised seamless portrayal. much so, offered around 100 within 10 days its release. itâ€™s been rollercoaster ever since, goes up! versatility, terrorist called dr.dang karma, drunk father tezaab, supportive best friend lamhe, father/best ddlj, hilarious college principal kuch hota hai, naive haseena maan jayegi, criminal business tycoon kaho na pyaar competitive lawyer veer zaara, responsible police agent wednesday, timid con special 26 lately former pm manmohan singh accidental prime minister. mind you, favourite amongst kherâ€™s 400+ films. stage artist, veteran actor, tv host now prominent hollywood has starred oscar-nominated silver linings playbook, hit netflix show sense currently working american series new amsterdam. oh also runs mumbai. love across borders accolades touched sky. need say more? 1950 age 12, had already decided pursue career. support from principals, took part festivals later joined living. being natural earlier stuck between doing parallel commercial eventually found ground both. negative first arjun, naam, lakhan, sir more; andaz apna where plays double both strict brother aka tejaa, stand out. always mixed humour special. main tejaa hu, mark idhar hai iconic dialogue lover forget! legendary comic inspector mohra, inquisitive neighbour judaai, funny uncle mr & mrs khiladi breaks fourth wall gives updates news reporter(class act!), nosy chachi 420, sharp security guard jayegi(jo chacha wahi bhatija hai…) 2000 came biggest hera pheri won number awards baburao whoâ€™s comical dialogues mannerisms left audience fits laughter. stream priyadarshan films each other couldâ€™ve done justice those masterpieces. hungama, malamaal weekly, chup ke bhool bhulaiya top picks list. did continue serious aitraaz, atheist my god! recently sunil dutt sanju plus vital advisor uri, creating â€˜joshâ€™. which us wonder, there anything canâ€™t pull off? years, actors tripathi taking centre loved do. joining club debutant siddhanth chaturvedi mc sher latest release gully boy brought forth strongly ranveer singhâ€™s murad, term dissolved just now.
